name: “Witch's Bargain” Overclocker
description: You know those helpful backup parts you have? And the little tools to put them into place for quick repairs? Yeah what if you shoved those directly into the reactor for a touch more juice. We thought so. Again, there’s a waiver you gotta sign.
effect: You may spend two repairs when you Overcharge, in addition to the Heat cost, to activate a Barrage instead of any other action.
